description:
From crushing the bunny hill to making the old-timers look bad in the park, these goggles will help your Grom keep their eyes on their line. The ventilated frame and dual-layered lenses reduce the likelihood of fogging up.

  • Fits youth and small faces best
  • Lightweight, flexible polyurethane frame
  • Rise™ ventilation system combats lens fogging
  • Triple layer Isotron™ face foam is 3 different densities and features moisture wicking Dri-Force™ fleece
  • Silicone-ribbed strap
  • Double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • Cylindrical lenses provide crisp detail edge-to-edge
name: Spy+ Crusher Elite Junior Goggles - Children to Youths
